General.Name: Satyamitra Kemas Lestari Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Satyamitra Kemas Lestari Tbk operates as an integrated carton packaging and logistics solutions company in Indonesia. The company offers corrugated carton, pre-print corrugated, offset printing, and rigid boxes. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Satyamitra Kemas Lestari Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Satyamitra Investindo Pratama.
General.Address: Kawasan Industri Benua Permai Lestari, Tangerang, Indonesia, 15720

1.Name: Mr. Thie  David
1.Title: Gen. Mang. of Accounting & Fin. and Corp. Sec.
